# The `VPScalarIVStepsRecipe` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A recipe for handling phi nodes of integer and floating-point inductions, producing their scalar values. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::VPScalarIVStepsRecipe</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A recipe for handling phi nodes of integer and floating-point inductions, producing their scalar values.
